QuestData.Title: Wrath of the Blightcaller
QuestData.Description: The Alliance dogs have bitten off more than they can chew. They have attacked the Banshee Queen, and invoked the wrath of her champion!$B$BLike my bow, my axes, and my hounds, you will be an agent of vengeance. Pile the bodies high, $c, and know that I am doing the same. When next we meet, I expect to see blood upon your hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa 7th Legion Paratroopers or Skyfire Gryphon-Riders.
